title: Metal Mold Form Nuts For Sweet Russian Nuts Oreshki Pastry Cookie Nutlets (Set of 60 pcs)
features: Probably, each of us remembers the unusually tasty and as if magic nuts filled with condensed milk, which in childhood was prepared by mom, grandmother or neighbor.
So why not bring pleasant memories into reality? To do this, you just need to buy a set of wallnut shaped baking molds and start your magic yourself.

It is not necessary to make nuts only with condensed milk. The choice of filling depends on the imagination of who is using oreshnitsa and what products are currently available, and it could be jam, cream, peanut butter, chocolate paste, and so on.

Set for 60 halves at one time!!! Even a child can prepare nuts, but under the supervision of parents. Creating extraordinary delicacies - the process is always creative and fun, which means baking nuts can become one of the family traditions!
Dimensions of the mold: 5 x 4 cm. Reusable.
description: Set of metallic walnut-shaped baking molds for traditional ex-USSR nuts cookies with condensed milk filling. Besides resulting pastries can be filled with a variety of fillings: berry, chocolate, cottage cheese, as well as with jam, whipped cream, peanut butter, cream, vanilla cream, pudding, honey. Halves of the "nut" can be filled with stuffing and not put together. Cooking recipes depend on your imagination. Set of molds allow baking up to 40 or 60 halves of the nut. Nuts Cookies molds material - special food-grade stainless steel. HOW TO: Lubricate inner side of molds with oil, put a little dough into each cell, leave some inner space for filling and bake the shells until golden brown. Cool, dub the edges. Stuff the halves with stuffing and put halves together.
